# data_science_common

UNDER CONSTRUCTION: A simple Python library for facilitating analysis.

---

## Installation:

```aidl
pip install data-science-common
```

## Usage

```
from pids import pid
public_id = pid.from_int(1234)
# public_id is now "gxd"
id = pid.to_int("gxd")
# id is now 1234
```
